definition[0]: if people or teams play off, they play the last game in a sports competition, in order to decide who is the winner
example[0]: The top two teams will play off at Twickenham for the county title.
definition[1]: to deliberately use a fact, action, idea etc in order to make what you are doing better or to get an advantage
example[1]: The two musicians played off each other in a piece of inspired improvisation.
definition[2]: a game played to decide who will win after a previous game has ended with two teams or players having equal points
definition[3]: a game, usually one of a series of games, played by the best teams or players in a competition in order to decide the final winner
example[2]: The Lakers will meet the Bulls in the playoffs.
